group_1.textLeft: Today's all on this cutie! I've got snacks and@drinks too!★

group_1.textRight: Oh... So that's why you were carrying such a@large backpack...

group_1.textLeft: I had to pick a karaoke place that allows@bring-your-owns,
or else it'd cost too much!
This cutie figured it's a good way to hang@and have fun indoors without leaving Takarazaki.
And we can like, start over afterwards!
To make up for me doubting you all like that,
and for shoving you around without considering@your convenience!

group_1.textRight: But now that we're all here, um,
can't we just go to Sasha-san's house, like we@agreed in the beginning...?
Yes, and I've already finished cleaning up my room...

group_1.textLeft: But it's my cute lil' self who caused all the trouble,
and I got myself so worked up that I didn't prepare@anything to play with ya'll...
It's not right to just hang out with ya at Sasha's@house without preparations, y'know?
...I realized when Hiko-kun said so, and it hit me@like "aha!"

group_1.textRight: You only realized that upon being told...?

group_1.textLeft: Waaah, you're gonna make me cry...
I mean, I seriously reflected on it, right?
Yeah, Princess... I'm caught off-guard by your@whims a lot, but...

group_1.textRight: We understand that you are doing this for all of@us, Aika-san.

group_1.textLeft: We'll just accept your feelings and treat ourselves@today!

group_1.textRight: Yes, since that's what Her Highness wants.

group_1.textCenter: (...It's seriously unimaginable compared to back@then, right, Hiko-kun?)
(That I'd get to find friends who can accept cute@lil' me
and for you being inside of me...)

group_1.textRight: Wh-wha...? What's with this all out of nowhere...?

group_1.textLeft: Today is free time, so just sing away, 'kay?
Let's get pumped up to the max! Kyaha!★
